title: Order Ping X
description:
Using a lot of plugins can slow down WooCommerce, making the simplest tasks, like accessing order details, a real pain. 

With Order Ping X, you can track all your orders in one dashboard, without logging anywhere or relying on email notifications.

Unlike email accounts, Order Ping X connects directly to your stores. This means that your order data is securely stored locally, with no third parties involved.
